long_description: The Fox River Double Ragg mittens combine heavy-weight ragg wool exteriors with soft terry linings to keep your hands warm when the temperature drops. Double-thick mittens with wool/nylon exteriors provide excellent warmth on cold winter days. Plush acrylic/wool/nylon lining is comfortable next to skin. Anatomically shaped for right and left hands. Mittens can be worn under waterproof mitten shells (sold separately).
short_description: The Fox River Double Ragg mittens combine heavy-weight ragg wool exteriors with soft terry linings to keep your hands warm when the temperature drops.
